home.title: Home
home.description: This app is a template made up of reusable components. It consists of headers, footers, and main sections, and you can create various apps by just changing the colors.
home.navigateDesc: You can move to other screens by clicking the buttons below or by using the footer menu.
home.templateDesc: You can easily develop various apps using this template. You can easily change the style of your app by changing the colors in the themes/theme.ts file.

details.title: Details
details.description: This is a screen that shows detailed information. There is a back button in the header to return to the previous screen.
details.componentDesc: All screens use the same Header, Footer, MainSection components. Each component can be easily customized through props.
details.themeDesc: The theme system allows you to manage all of the app's colors and sizes in one place. When you change a theme in the themes/theme.ts file, it applies to all screens.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: You can change various settings of the app. Here, we have implemented only a few switches as examples.

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this feature
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found
errors.offline: You are currently offline. Some features may be limited
